issue.title: [CF 66] Problem with accents (french and others)
issue.body:
Hello,

There is a small problem with accents display since the localization files aren't converted in UTF-8.
I tried to convert TellMeWhen-frFr.lua in UTF-8 with Notepad++, it works better !

Congratulations for this great addon ;)


> Posted by CurseForge user Mordroba | Imported from CurseForge issue #66 | Raw

comments.body:
Awesome. They used to be UTF-8, but somehow got reverted back to ANSI.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Looks like it was just the French one, actually. Maybe I just skipped over it on accident a while back.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
